entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
